page.title: 05GROVE GARDEN CENTRE.
page.content: Mr.& Mrs.Wallwyn have been in business at the Garden Centre for 29 years. The business had been established as a vegetable small-holding.Originally,the land formed the kitchen garden of Grove Hall. Five full-time staff are now employed and the centre contains over 1,000 different species of plant.In area,it covers over three and a half acres. The most popular flowers are cyclamens,carnations and chrysanthemums and the most popular colour is red.Apart from from plants,seeds,fertilisers,vegetables, artificial and fresh flowers,and garden furniture are sold.Amateur and professional gardeners regularly travel from distances up to 100 miles. The Centre normally opens daily from 9.00-1700.It includes a cafe which provides light refreshments.
